examples.full_description: UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with just a company doesn't calculate any effects
UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with just a company with an opening balance writes down the opening balance

examples.description: has the correct periods against the calculated effects
examples.full_description: UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with just a company with an opening balance has the correct periods against the calculated effects

examples.description: returns the correct effects when periods are specified
examples.full_description: UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with just a company with an opening balance returns the correct effects when periods are specified

examples.description: calculates a purchase effect and a claim effect
examples.full_description: UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is AIA calculates a purchase effect and a claim effect
UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is AIA with a disposal adds a balancing charge

examples.description: adds the same set of effects
examples.full_description: UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is AIA with a disposal in the same year adds the same set of effects

examples.description: adds a balancing charge equal to the purchase amount
examples.full_description: UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is AIA with a disposal when the disposal amount is greater than the purchase amount adds a balancing charge equal to the purchase amount
UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is AIA with a disposal when the pool is negative despite another purchased asset adds a balancing charge
UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is AIA with a disposal when the pool is zero due to another purchased asset adds zero pool effects

examples.description: adds a small pools allowance claim
examples.full_description: UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is AIA with a disposal when the pool is small due to another purchased asset adds a small pools allowance claim

UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is AIA with a disposal when the pool is large due to another purchased asset adds a writing-down allowance claim

examples.description: leaves the excess to be written down in the main pool
examples.full_description: UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is AIA when the purchase amount exceeds the AIA threshold in a year leaves the excess to be written down in the main pool

UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is AIA when the purchase amount exceeds the AIA threshold in a year in legacy periods does not apply AIA thresholds

examples.description: leaves the excess to be written down in the main pool
examples.full_description: UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is AIA when the purchase of two assets exceeds the AIA threshold in a year leaves the excess to be written down in the main pool

examples.description: both get to use their own thresholds
examples.full_description: UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is AIA when two assets in separate years are near the AIA thresholds both get to use their own thresholds

examples.description: does not carry over the first asset's allowance
examples.full_description: UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is AIA when two assets in separate years are near the AIA thresholds when the other asset exceeds its threshold does not carry over the first asset's allowance

examples.description: calculates a purchase effect and a claim effect
examples.full_description: UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is FYA calculates a purchase effect and a claim effect
UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is FYA with a disposal adds a balancing charge

examples.description: adds the same set of effects
examples.full_description: UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is FYA with a disposal in the same year adds the same set of effects

examples.description: adds a balancing charge equal to the purchase amount
examples.full_description: UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is FYA with a disposal when the disposal amount is greater than the purchase amount adds a balancing charge equal to the purchase amount
UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is FYA with a disposal when the pool is negative despite another purchased asset adds a balancing charge
UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is FYA with a disposal when the pool is zero due to another purchased asset adds zero pool effects

examples.description: adds a small pools allowance claim
examples.full_description: UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is FYA with a disposal when the pool is small due to another purchased asset adds a small pools allowance claim

UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is FYA with a disposal when the pool is large due to another purchased asset adds a writing-down allowance claim

examples.description: does not claim FYA and WDA in the same period
examples.full_description: UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is FYA in a legacy year with a varying FYA (and 25% WDA) does not claim FYA and WDA in the same period
UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is FYA in a legacy year with a varying FYA (and 25% WDA) the day of an increase uses the new rate

examples.description: claims FYA at 100% and disposes into the pool at 100%

examples.description: claims FYA at 130% and disposes by balancing charge at a tapered rate
examples.full_description: UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is FYA in a year with the super deduction with a purchase at the full rate with a disposal after the super deduction ends in the same year claims FYA at 130% and disposes by balancing charge at a tapered rate

examples.description: claims FYA at 130% and disposes by balancing charge at 100%

examples.description: claims FYA and disposes by balancing charge at a tapered rate

examples.description: calculates a purchase effect, writing-down effects, and finally a small pools effect
examples.full_description: UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is MAIN_POOL calculates a purchase effect, writing-down effects, and finally a small pools effect
UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is MAIN_POOL with some opening balances calculates additional writing-down effects

UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is MAIN_POOL when the pool is increased by another asset in a previous year calculates additional writing-down effects

UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is MAIN_POOL when the pool is increased by another asset the same year calculates additional writing-down effects

UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is MAIN_POOL when the pool is increased by another asset while it is still writing down calculates additional writing-down effects

examples.description: does not calculate additional writing-down effects
examples.full_description: UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is MAIN_POOL when the pool is increased by another asset after it finishes writing down does not calculate additional writing-down effects

examples.description: calculates a purchase effect and a balancing charge

examples.description: does not calculate additional writing-down effects
examples.full_description: UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is MAIN_POOL when the pool is reduced by a disposed asset after it finishes writing down does not calculate additional writing-down effects

examples.description: reduces the amount to write down

examples.description: reduces the amount to write down

examples.description: reduces the amount to write down

UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a capital asset when the asset's tax treatment is SPECIAL_POOL with another asset in the special pool does interact

examples.full_description: UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a journal set with a negative value calculates a negative purchase effect and a balancing charge

examples.description: uses up the AIA allowance on the asset, because the asset came first
examples.full_description: UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a journal set sharing the AIA allowance with an asset purchased before the journal date uses up the AIA allowance on the asset, because the asset came first

examples.description: uses up the AIA allowance on the asset, because CapitalAsset is alphabetically before JournalSet
examples.full_description: UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a journal set sharing the AIA allowance with an asset purchased on the journal date uses up the AIA allowance on the asset, because CapitalAsset is alphabetically before JournalSet

examples.description: uses up the AIA allowance on the journal, because the journal came first
examples.full_description: UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects with a journal set sharing the AIA allowance with an asset purchased after the journal date uses up the AIA allowance on the journal, because the journal came first
UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects rounding to the pound with an opening balance rounds up the opening balance

examples.description: rounds up the opening pool value at the transition
examples.full_description: UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects rounding to the pound with an opening balance with a mixture of penny and whole pound periods rounds up the opening pool value at the transition
UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects rounding to the pound with three purchases when they are all AIA rounds their combined effects
UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects rounding to the pound with three purchases when they are all AIA when one is in a different period rounds the periods separately
UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects rounding to the pound with three purchases when they are all AIA when two are disposed combines the disposals too

examples.description: rounds the AIA even though there's none left on the date we do the rounding
examples.full_description: UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects rounding to the pound with three purchases when they are all AIA when an unrounded amount is used before a decrease, then the maximum possible AIA is used after it rounds the AIA even though there's none left on the date we do the rounding
UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects rounding to the pound with three purchases when they are all FYA rounds their combined effects
UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects rounding to the pound with three purchases when they are all WDA rounds their combined effects
UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects rounding to the pound with three purchases when they are all WDA when one is in a different period rounds the periods separately
UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects rounding to the pound with three purchases when they are all WDA when one is in a different pool rounds the pools separately

examples.description: rounds the AIA effects together and the WDA effect separately
examples.full_description: UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects rounding to the pound with three purchases when two are AIA and one is WDA rounds the AIA effects together and the WDA effect separately
UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects rounding to the pound with three purchases when there's one of each rounds their effects separately

examples.description: claims FYA at 130% and disposes by balancing charge at 130%, and rounds each one correctly
examples.full_description: UkLimitedCompany#capital_allowance_effects rounding to the pound with the super deduction claims FYA at 130% and disposes by balancing charge at 130%, and rounds each one correctly

Accounting::PerformanceBenchmarking::ReportPeriod#report_available? when the FreeAgent start date is after the report date returns false

Accounting::PerformanceBenchmarking::ReportPeriod#completed_quarters_this_year when the company is in their third quarter returns two completed quarters
